titleStmt.title: The forlorn lovers lament. To the tune of The bony broom.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Sir, be not think these lines have ..."
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 has "lover's" in the title.
Printed on the same sheet: A new ballad, composed by a lover, in praise of his Mistriss (Wing N557A).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
